thread.section_title: VeniceApartmentsItaly.com Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per VeniceApartmentsItaly.com | www.veniceapartmentsitaly.com
thread.title: Heidrun Johnstone
thread.title_full: VeniceApartmentsItaly.com recensione scritta da Heidrun Johnstone

author: Heidrun Johnstone
title: Heidrun Johnstone
text: My reservation for an apartment in Venice was confirmed very promptly and with valuable detail. The website was easy to follow and it worked very well - the description of the apartments were very detailed and there were good pictures - the map is most helpful! Thank you - so far - I look forward to my trip to Venice and hope that everything will be as good as it sounds!
